text:
@realDonaldTrump ADDRESS THE VIRUS!

America continues to see a daily death toll equal to that of 9/11

69,925 Americans had died of covid19 as of May 5

72,293 May 6

74,810 May 7

76842 May 8

It takes 3 hours to read names of 9/11 victims

Today we'd read names of covid victims 24/7 for 3 days

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
